Categorize this IT Ticket:

windows upgrade insufficient free disk space re notification upgrade process how free up space hi have only managed free up drive have programs used have used tool but worried removing something can get someone available can help further clean drive without damaging something expert here thank you sent tuesday october notification upgrade process how free up space hello you already found out our previous announcements rollout upgrade was started one month ago you receiving because your drive you have enough space perform upgrade process minimum requirement free space you advised follow next steps free up some space your drive move your personal data separate personal drive regarding your work files please move them onto your you have space available there you can use app located here tools desktop size your folders files can be helpful tool for you easily identify biggest files folders if you still have available after file move please contact or note if you member or teams please apply upgrade yet you can always get contact with our kind regards ext

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket, and the system offers several categories. The ticket discusses issues related to a Windows upgrade, specifically insufficient free disk space and steps for freeing up that space. It seems clear that this is related to storage capacity during the upgrade process. Hence, I think the best category is "Storage." It’s not about hardware or administrative rights, just focused on storage. So, I’ll respond with the category "Storage" in JSON format.{"category":"Storage"}
